short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peaceful, beautiful animations on your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When opening a new tab, why should you be greeted by a plain screen? Get greeted by a beautiful illustration that has soothing and relaxing micro animations built in, that loops infinitely.
